structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Statements of danger -- Penalty for receipt.
law.text: An assisted-living community that is issued more than two (2) statements of danger on separate dates within a six (6) month period that are not withdrawn by the department may be fined up to five hundred dollars ($500).
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 36, sec. 12, effective July 15, 2010.
